field.name: mega_desc
field.label: Subtitle Text
field.description: Subtitle added here will be shown as the Tag line below the Menu Item Title. Works for Submenu items also.

field.name: mega_icon
field.label: Menu Icon
field.description: Show icon font in menu. eg: icon-home

field.name: mega_class
field.label: Custom Css Class
field.description: Additional CSS class to apply to the menu items.

field.name: mega_cols
field.label: Columns of Child Items
field.description: Number of Columns. Works for first level menu items, with groups = Y for each subset going into each column.

field.name: mega_colxw
field.label: Submenu Column[i] Width
field.description: enter the desired column width as colw1=200 or colw3=300.

field.name: mega_group
field.label: Group
field.description: Set to yes for number of columns per first level menu items.

field.name: mega_subcontent
field.label: Submenu Content
field.description: Choose content to show in submenus. Multiple modules based on name or module position can be selected and loaded. Use Ctrl + Click to select Multiple Items.
